:: Wolfgang ::

:: Wolfgang slowly grasps consiousness, seeing nothing but the inside wall 
of a CR chamber, a prison of sorts. ::

Those dirty basterds have trapped me. LET ME OUT!

:: Slams his fists against the door of the CR chamber with mighty fists full 
of anger,fear,and hate.  The punches dent the CR chamber but his efforts are 
futile in getting him out. ::

What do you want from me!?!?
